timeline.message:
1792278: use autoheal value during registration
 Leverage auto-heal value available in consumer during registration with auto-attach enable activation key.

timeline.bodyText:
I know this is a bit nit-picky, but good log messages help people figure out what's happened without having to attach a debugger. Using the same warning log output message and appending either of these two would result in misleading warning messages:
On the scenario where contentAccessEnabled is true, this is a bit misleading:
Auto-attach is disabled for owner because of the content access mode setting and consumer autoheal value. Skipping...
It should be more like:
Auto-attach is disabled for owner because of the content access mode setting. Also, the consumer autoheal value is false. Skipping...
On the scenario where contentAccessEnabled is false, this is very misleading:
Auto-attach is disabled for owner because of the consumer autoheal value. Skipping...
The consumer autoheal value has no effect on the owner's auto-attach setting, so auto-attach cannot be disabled for the owner. This should be more like:
The consumer autoheal value is false. Skipping...
timeline.author: nikosmoum
